knimeNode.name: Regression (Batch)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Perform Regression for selected variables simultanously.

fullDescription.intro: This node performs a regression on each selected target variable using the selected independent variables (the same for all targets). Depending on the choosen distribution of the target variables linear/logistic/... regression is performed.
fullDescription.option: Choose (dependent) target variables for which the regression shall be performed
Choose the family of the target variable (cf. glm in R)
Choose Independent Variables used for each regression

ports.inPort: Data with variables in the columns and samples in the rows
ports.outPort: Table which contains p-values for each choosen target variable
As the input table, but all choosen target variables are replaced with the residuals of the regression model

views.view: STDOUT and STDERR of the according R process
